name: Miflected
description:
Miflected is a puzzle game about mirrors made for the mirror game jam.
Note: This game works best with Firefox or Chrome (please let me know if it works with other browsers too).

Controls

Game:

  • A: Move left
  • D: Move right
  • W: Jump
  • LMB: Shoot (Activate mirror)
  • RMB: Teleport (You need to activate the teleport ability first)
  • ESC: Go back to menu

Level editor:

  • P: Play level
  • G: Generate random level (If you are really unlucky, it might take a long time)
  • R: Select tile
  • LMB: Add tiles
  • MMB: Remove tiles
  • ESC: Go back to menu

Have fun!
